chart.title: CPU Utilization due to searches
chart.searchTemplate: `audit_searchlocal` | `audit_rexsearch` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search by search_id | search $inclscheduled$ $inclinternal$ | timechart per_second(total_run_time) as avgutil | eval avg_utilization_percent = avgutil * 100 | fields - avgutil

table.title: Usage over time
table.searchTemplate: `audit_searchlocal` | `audit_rexsearch` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search by search_id | search $inclscheduled$ $inclinternal$ | timechart median(total_run_time) as "Median search time" perc95(total_run_time) as "95th Percentile search time" count as "Search count" dc(user) as "Users"

table.title: Common Searches
table.searchTemplate: `audit_searchlocal` | `audit_rexsearch` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search by search_id | search $inclscheduled$ $inclinternal$ | stats count median(total_run_time) as "Median run time" values(user) as Users by search | sort - count

table.title: Expensive Searches
table.searchTemplate: `audit_searchlocal` | `audit_rexsearch` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search first(apiStartTime) as "Earliest time" first(apiEndTime) as "Latest time" by search_id | search $inclscheduled$ $inclinternal$ | sort - total_run_time | fields - search_id

table.title: Common Search Commands
table.searchTemplate: `audit_searchlocal` | `audit_rexsearch` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search by search_id | search $inclscheduled$ $inclinternal$ | eval commands = commands(search) | stats count dc(search_id) as Searches by commands | rename commands as Command | sort - count

table.title: Search Commands Associated with Expensive Searches
table.searchTemplate: `audit_searchlocal` | `audit_rexsearch` | convert num(total_run_time) | eval user = if(user="n/a", null(), user) | stats min(_time) as _time first(user) as user max(total_run_time) as total_run_time first(search) as search by search_id | search $inclscheduled$ $inclinternal$ | eval commands = commands(search) | streamstats window=1 values(commands) as commands | stats avg(total_run_time) as "Average Total Run Time" stdev(total_run_time) as "stdev Run Time" count as "Searches" by commands | rename command as Commands | sort - "Average Total Run Time"
